item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 投资者押注法国大选后资产将面临数月波动
item.description: 无论哪个政党在周日的法国议会选举中胜出，一些投资者都认为这次投票标志着法国股票和债券市场将进入一个更加动荡的时期。【原文：No matter which party comes out on top in Sunday’s French parliamentary election, some investors are betting the vote marks the beginning of a more turbulent period for the country’s stock and bond markets.】

item.title: 英国金融家聘请拉扎德为夭折的赞比亚交易提供顾问服务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，英国国际投资公司（British International Investment Plc）已聘请拉扎德公司（Lazard Inc.【原文：British International Investment Plc, has hired Lazard Inc. to advise it on the way forward for a convertible preference share investment in a Zambian meat producer, according to people with knowledge of the matter, after the firm lost more than a third of its value.】

item.title: 瑞典房价有望从 2022 年的低迷中复苏
item.description: 通胀冲击使借贷成本上升，导致住房建设几近停滞，瑞典的住房价格已经收复了第一年所遭受损失的近一半。【原文：Swedish housing prices have recouped close to half of the losses they sustained in the first year of an inflation shock that sent borrowing costs higher and led to a near-standstill in homebuilding.】

item.title: 需求担忧持续，铁矿石从一个月高点回落
item.description: 铁矿石从一个月高点回落，因为投资者在权衡中国需求的复苏是否可持续。【原文：Iron ore retreated from a one-month high as investors weighed whether a recovery in Chinese demand will be sustainable.】

item.title: 印度交易员结束本周交易，股市再创新高，航运股上涨
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets.】

item.title: 分析师称中国人民银行对债券反弹的回击影响甚微
item.description: 中国的观察家们对中国央行影响收益率下行压力的能力表示怀疑，尽管央行已准备好出售数千亿元人民币的债券，为反弹降温。【原文：China watchers expressed some skepticism about the central bank’s ability to influence downward pressure on yields, despite it readying a pool of hundreds of billions of yuan of bonds to sell to cool a rally.】

item.title: 现在对工党来说，愚蠢的是吉尔兹市场
item.description:
与之前的撒切尔和布莱尔一样，基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）也是在残酷的财政政策而非选民的支持下上台执政的。【原文：

Like Thatcher and Blair before him, Keir Starmer surges to power in a mandate dictated more by brutal finances than voters.

】

item.title: 人工智能引领的经济复苏促使联昌国际上调马来西亚科技股评级
item.description: 联昌国际证券有限公司（CIMB Securities Sdn.）将马来西亚科技股的评级从 "中性 "上调至 "增持"，原因是人工智能需求增长带动盈利前景改善。【原文：CIMB Securities Sdn. upgraded Malaysia’s technology shares to overweight from neutral on improving earnings visibility led by growing demand for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 英美煤矿爆炸引发澳大利亚煤炭股反弹
item.description: 在一场大火烧毁了澳大利亚的一个主要煤矿之后，澳大利亚煤炭股本周的表现创下了多年来的最佳水平，摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）认为澳大利亚煤炭股还将继续上扬。【原文：Australian coal stocks are headed for their best week in years after a fire shut down one of country’s major mines, with Morgan Stanley seeing further upside for the commodity.】

item.title: 全球股市屡创新高，比特币却连续第四天下跌
item.description: 比特币连续第四个交易日下挫，这是加密货币大跌的一部分，与近期全球股市屡创新高形成鲜明对比。【原文：Bitcoin sank for a fourth consecutive trading session, part of a wider crypto selloff that contrasts with recent record highs in global stocks.】

item.title: 中国人民银行准备发售数十亿元人民币的债券池，并与主要银行合作
item.description: 中国央行采取了下一步行动，通过出售政府债券来为创纪录的涨势降温，央行表示，通过与贷款机构达成的协议，央行现在可以支配 "数千亿 "元人民币的政府债券。【原文：China’s central bank took the next step toward selling government bonds to cool a record-breaking rally, saying it now has “hundreds of billions” of yuan of the securities at its disposal through agreements with lenders.】

item.title: 投资者预期美联储将开始放宽政策，推动黄金走高
item.description: 由于市场预期美联储将在年底前降低利率，黄金连续两周上涨，交易员们期待着美国的薪资数据为下一批前景提供线索。【原文：Gold headed for a back-to-back weekly gain on expectations that the Federal Reserve will trim interest rates before year-end, with traders looking ahead to US payrolls data for the next batch of clues on the outlook.】

item.title: 高盛和花旗预测英伟达供应商海力士在上涨 90% 后将获得更多收益
item.description: 韩国 SK 海力士公司是 Nvidia 公司的重要供应商，其股价在过去一年中飙升了 90% 以上，华尔街预测其股价将进一步上涨。【原文：Shares in South Korea’s SK Hynix Inc., a key supplier to Nvidia Corp., have jumped more than 90% over the past year and Wall Street is predicting further gains.】

item.title: 莫迪的印度人民党被更强大的反对党 "动摇 "了，国会领导人如是说
item.description: 一位反对党高级领导人说，印度新近壮大的反对党令总理纳伦德拉-莫迪和其他执政党领导人感到震怒，反对党现在计划利用其在议会中扩大的影响力，在多条战线上挑战印度人民党。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi and other ruling party leaders have been rattled by India’s newly emboldened opposition, which now plans to use its expanded presence in parliament to challenge the Bharatiya Janata Party on multiple fronts, a senior opposition leader said.】

item.title: 美银银行力争到 2027 年将越南资产翻番并扩大投资
item.description: 马来亚银行（Malayan Banking Bhd）计划到 2027 年将在越南的资产翻一番，达到 20 亿美元，并成为该国银团贷款额最高的外国银行，以充分利用越南蓬勃发展的经济。【原文：Malayan Banking Bhd plans to double assets in Vietnam to $2 billion by 2027 and become the country’s top foreign bank for syndicated loans, to capitalize on a booming economy.】

item.title: 据说嘉能可的泰克煤炭交易即将获得加拿大批准
item.description: 两位知情人士告诉彭博社，加拿大政府准备批准嘉能可集团（Glencore Plc）斥资 69 亿美元收购泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd. ）的冶金煤业务，但有几个苛刻的条件。【原文：Canada’s government is poised to approve Glencore Plc’s $6.9-billion acquisition of Teck Resources Ltd.’s metallurgical coal business with several stringent conditions, two sources with knowledge of the transaction told Bloomberg.】

item.title: 受飓风风险和美国库存下降影响，石油接近两个月高点
item.description: 由于飓风贝里尔预示着风暴季节可能会更加严重，而美国原油库存的减少暗示着需求的改善，石油交易量接近两个月来的最高点。【原文：Oil traded near a two-month high as Hurricane Beryl portended a potentially worse storm season, while shrinking US crude stockpiles hinted at improved demand.】

item.title: 日本家庭支出下降，经济增长前景黯淡
item.description: 日本 5 月份的家庭支出出乎意料地下降，这增加了消费不再是第二季度经济主要驱动力的可能性，也使央行下一次加息的前景变得更加复杂。【原文：Japan’s household spending unexpectedly fell in May, raising the likelihood that consumption won’t be a key driver for the economy in the second quarter, and complicating the prospects for the central bank’s next interest rate hike.】

item.title: 日元交易员为日本央行决议前的 "钉子户 "制定游戏计划
item.description: 在日本央行 7 月 31 日的政策决定之前，货币交易员们本月将面临漫长而煎熬的等待，届时可能的加息和削减债券购买规模可能最终会给陷入困境的日元带来一些缓解。【原文：Currency traders face a long and nail-biting wait this month until the the Bank of Japan’s policy decision on July 31, when a potential interest-rate hike and cut to bond purchases may finally bring some relief to the embattled yen.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好特斯拉高管停止与印度联系投资事宜。普京推动基于中国联系的全球安全架构。工党在英国投票中如愿获胜。澳大利亚天然气可能短缺。【原文：Good morning. Tesla executives stopped contacting India about investment. Putin pushes global security architecture based on China links. Labour wins as expected in UK vote. Australia may run short on gas. — Sebastian Boyd】

item.title: 美国就业数据公布前，亚洲股市将保持谨慎：市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市以平盘开盘，交易商目前正关注周五晚些时候公布的美国就业数据，以寻找美联储降息的线索。【原文：Equities in Asia were primed for a flat open with traders now looking ahead to US jobs data due later Friday for clues on Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: 寻求特朗普获胜交易吸引投资者重返日本股市
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在美国总统竞选中的领先优势不断扩大，这引发了人们急于在全球市场中找出关键的制胜交易。历史表明，日本股市是一个很好的赌注。【原文：Donald Trump’s growing lead in the US presidential race has sparked a rush to identify the key winning trades in global markets. History suggests that Japanese stocks are a good bet.】

item.title: 日本消费类股票将因工资增长而受到提振
item.description: 一些投资者认为，随着工资上涨带来的支出复苏迹象开始显现，日本滞后的消费类股可能会在下半年得到提振。【原文：Japan’s lagging consumption stocks will likely get a boost in the second half of the year, as signs of recovery in spending due to wage hikes kick in, according to some investors.】

item.title: 津巴布韦总统表示，津巴布韦可能在 2030 年前采用 ZiG 作为唯一货币
item.description: 津巴布韦总统埃默森-姆南加古瓦（Emmerson Mnangagwa）暗示，在 2030 年结束当前多种货币体系的最后期限到来之前，该国新的金银支持货币将成为唯一的法定货币。【原文：Zimbabwean President Emmerson Mnangagwa hinted that the nation’s new bullion-backed currency will be the sole legal tender before a 2030 deadline to end the current multicurrency system.】

item.title: 预计工党将在英国大选中赢得多数席位，英镑保持稳定
item.description: 出口民调显示，英国工党将在大选中取得长期预料中的压倒性胜利，这令市场乐观地认为，英国政坛的动荡时期已经结束，基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）有望成为首相，并承诺加强经济稳定。【原文：The pound was steady after an exit poll indicated the UK’s Labour Party will secure its long-predicted landslide election victory, fueling market optimism that a tumultuous period in British politics is over as Keir Starmer looks set to become Prime Minister on a pledge of greater economic stability.】

item.title: 警方建议在珠宝调查中对博尔索纳罗提出指控：G1
item.description: 据巴西当地网站 G1 周四报道，巴西联邦警察在调查前总统博尔索纳罗涉嫌非法出售从沙特阿拉伯和巴林政府获得的礼物一事后，建议对其提起刑事指控。【原文：Brazil’s federal police recommended criminal charges against former President Jair Bolsonaro after probing the alleged illegal sale of gifts received from the governments of Saudi Arabia and Bahrain, local website G1 reported Thursday.】

item.title: 印度航空公司炸弹威胁恶作剧激增导致航班混乱
item.description: 当 22 岁的莫利纳-辛格（Molina Singh）飞往孟买的航班在途中突然降落时，她没想到会在艾哈迈达巴德的小机场等待 12 个小时、接受法医笔迹检查以及行李在停机坪上融化。【原文：When 22-year-old Molina Singh’s flight to Mumbai landed abruptly in the middle of her journey, she wasn’t expecting a 12-hour wait at Ahmedabad’s tiny airport, a forensic handwriting examination and luggage melting on the tarmac.】

item.title: 拉加德称欧洲央行需要更多数据来保证通胀
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，在进一步降低利率之前，欧洲中央银行需要更多的保证，即通胀率将回到2%的目标。【原文：The European Central Bank requires additional reassurance that inflation is headed back to the 2% target before it lowers interest rates further, according to President Christine Lagarde.】

item.title: 育空地区维多利亚黄金公司鹰矿附近检测到氰化物泄漏
item.description: 加拿大育空地区称，维多利亚黄金公司鹰矿附近的一条水道在发生设备故障和山体滑坡后检测到氰化物含量升高。【原文：Canada’s Yukon Territory said elevated levels of cyanide were detected in a waterway near Victoria Gold Corp.’s Eagle Mine after an equipment failure and landslide at the site.】
